page.title: 14 METAL WORKS
page.content: Bofors is a factory in the village of Ramsden Heath where they make buckets to fit onto diggers,and parts for fork-lift trucks.They are a Swedish firm. There are three main parts to the building. Firstly there is the office block where the decisions are made and where all the files are kept. The file with the list of components is kept on computers for instant 3-D display.This is because so many components are needed.In the second building they shape the buckets and make the parts for fort-lift trucks.They weld all the shapes together here,before taking them to the third building. In this building the parts are spray painted. Two years ago they made a bucket which was large enough to hold 50 men.This is the biggest bucket in the world.
